about_the_game:
Dive into the exciting world of slot machines and manage your own casino with "Casino Manager Simulator"! In this realistic simulation game, you will take charge of running your casino, managing slot machines, and keeping your customers happy. Enhanced with detailed management features and stunning graphics, this game puts you in the driver’s seat of a bustling casino.

Key Features:

Slot Machine Management: Add different slot machines, maintain them, and provide the best gaming experience for your customers.
Dynamic Customer Interactions: Meet the needs of your customers and develop strategies to keep them engaged in your casino.
Cleaning and Organization: Keep your casino clean, manage trash and stains, and provide a pleasant environment for your patrons.
Advanced Scoring System: Optimize cleanliness and customer satisfaction to boost your casino's rating.
Realistic Graphics and Atmosphere: Customize the interior design of your casino and create a realistic atmosphere with impressive graphics.

About the Game:

Step into the mesmerizing world of slot machines and elevate your casino to the top! "Casino Manager Simulator" is a comprehensive simulation game that allows you to meticulously manage the operations of your casino. Work on keeping your customers satisfied, maintaining cleanliness, and providing top-notch gaming experiences. With a scoring system based on cleanliness and customer satisfaction, grow your casino and climb to the top of the leaderboards.

name: Casino Manager Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7-11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7-11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon™ RX 560
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space

short_description: Step into the mesmerizing world of slot machines and elevate your casino to the top! "Casino Manager Simulator" is a comprehensive simulation game that allows you to meticulously manage the operations of your casino.
supported_languages: English, Turkish, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal
